sys_remote_update_set.description: - deactivated the "Help the Help Desk" module - add "Do not delete" field and Business Rule to the cmdb_ci table to stop deletion of certain records - update test timeframes to go-live values for Problem Task inactivity and Problem Task not assigned Business Rule - added Service tag field to the cmdb_ci table
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2013-04-04 Last minute configurations
